channel.title: Bakings on relax+dine
channel.description: Recent content in Bakings on relax+dine

item.title: Biscuits
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup gf flour with xantham gum (1to1 or Cup4Cup) 1 cup super fine white rice flour 1⁄2 tsp salt 4 tsp tbsp baking powder 1⁄4 tsp baking soda 8 tbsp (1 stick) frozen butter About 1 cup buttermilk (enough to make it thoroughly moist but not tacky) Directions Preheat 450F. Thoroughly mix dry ingredients. Shred frozen butter into dry and mix lightly. Incorporate in the buttermilk carefully, enough for the dry to soak up the buttermilk.
